rukus.text: Zai huimie yuangu de ge shidai zhihou, wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, yi zuo shiren de mingzheng, xiangdao he enhui, yibian tamen jinian.
Dang wo yi wo de mingling qishi mu sa de shihou, ni meiyou zai xishan bian, ye meiyou qinyan kanjian.
Dan wo chuangzaole xuduo shiji, naxie shidai cengjingguo manchang de suiyue. Ni meiyou juzhu zai mai de yan ren zhi jian, dui tamen xuandu wo de jixiang, dan wo shi paiqian shizhe de.

Dang wo zhaohuan (mu sa) de shihou, ni meiyou zai shan bian, dan zhe shi cong ni de zhu jiangxia de enhui, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe ceng jianglin tamen di naxie minzhong, yibian tamen jinian.
Ruo bushi tamen jiang wei ziji fanzui er zaoyang, bingqie shuo: Women de zhu a! Ni zenme bu pai yige shizhe lai jiaohua women, shi women zunshou ni de jixiang, er wei xinshi ne?

Dang wo suo qishi de zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo: Ta weisheme buneng huode xiang mu sa suo huode de jixiang ne? Nandao tamen meiyou fouren yiqian mu sa suo huode de jixiang ma? Tamen ceng shuo: Shi liang zhong huxiang yinzheng de moshu. Tamen ceng shuo: Women biding yigai dou buxin.
Ni shuo: Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de ren, namo, nimen na yi bu jingdian lai, zhiyaoshi zhenzhu suo qishi de, bingqie shi bi zhe liang bu jingdian geng neng yindao renlei de, wo jiu zunshou ta.

Ruguo tamen bu daying ni, namo, ni yingdang zhidao tamen zhishi shuncong ziji de siyu. She zhenzhu suo qishi de zhengdao, er shuncong ziji de siyu zhe, you shei bi ta geng mi wu ne? Zhenzhu biding bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.
